mapper.select: SELECT cart_id, session_id, menu_qty, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as r_date, date_format(edit_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as e_date, member_id, menu_id, is_direct_order FROM cart WHERE cart_id=#{cart_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET session_id=#{session_id}, menu_qty=#{menu_qty}, edit_date=now(), member_id=#{member_id}, is_direct_order=#{is_direct_order} WHERE cart_id=#{cart_id}
UPDATE cart SET edit_date=now(), member_id=#{member_id} WHERE session_id=#{session_id} AND is_direct_order="N"
